message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. I believe it could be a great asset for you. Let's start with an offer of $200 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway and propose a final offer of $175 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still feel that $150 would be a fair price for the product. I would like to stick with my original counteroffer.

Considering the value and quality of our product, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to offer the product for $180. This price reflects the value of the product while staying competitive with your budget. I hope this proposal works for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I would still like to stick with my original counteroffer of $150. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.
